title: Luka shocked by trade but excited to join Lakers
description: Luka Doncic said he was shocked when the Mavericks traded him to the Lakers. "I had to check if it was April 1," he said.

title: KD downgraded to doubtful as trade talks swirl
description: Kevin Durant has been downgraded to doubtful for Wednesday's road game against the Thunder as trade speculation swirls around the Suns' star
author: Tim MacMahon

title: 13 VAR mistakes in Premier League so far this season
description: There have been a total of 13 video assistant referee (VAR) mistakes in the Premier League so far this season, say league bosses.

title: Arteta 'disappointed' by Arsenal transfer window
description: Mikel Arteta says he is disappointed by Arsenal's failure to make any signings during the winter transfer window, but praises the club's discipline.

title: Luka will take the torch as the next great Laker. First, the shock must wear off
description: At Tuesday's intro news conference, it was clear Dončić was still coming to terms with not being a Maverick: 'I had to check [if] it was April 1. I couldn't believe it.'
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Ichiro Suzuki snubber still unknown after BBWAA releases batch of remaining Hall of Fame votes
description: We'll probably never know who didn't vote Ichiro Suzuki for the Hall of Fame.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: The key things that didn't happen in this January window
Man Utd targeting 'top' forward in summer after Rashford exit
description: Manchester United don't want to repeat the mistakes of the past - signing a top forward would help them with that.
